metadata.title: CVE-2014-3629 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in the XML Exchange module inApache Qpid 0.30 allows remote attackers to cause outgoing HTTP connectionsvia a crafted message.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
